name: Pocket Menu Co., Ltd.
description: Provider of an application platform intended to be used for booking restaurant. The company's platform provides online booking and payment service with high-end restaurants in Japan for mobile & PC browser users, enabling them to enjoy the great food culture of Japan without any stress including language and payment barrier.
